chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Narenwin Barda,
      p. 57 (53)—Aes Sedai of
      the Yellow Ajah to whom Ronde Macura sends her
      reports.  She is short, slender, and shy—it is easy to forget that
      she is there.  She was sent to find Gawyn and the
      Younglings to give them “orders.”
